Html:
Hi guys

its a wonderfull ribbon I've ever seen, I've a question, Does it work in 32 bit OS? I could not run it in windows Xp! does it work only in windows 7?

how can I run it in windows xp?

 

and another question: does it work in windows 7 32bit?

best regards..

No, the ribbon only works with Windows 7 and Windows Vista with the platform update.

It should work in both 32-bit and 64-bit environments.
